content.join: Please get the team invitation code from the team creator, enter the invitation code to join the team.

confirm.title: Confirm Kick User
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to kick out team member "{{user}}"?

confirm.title: Confirm Quit
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to leave the team "{{team}}"?

content.create: Create a team and you can organize a team and invite others to join. Everyone can only have one team.

confirm.title: Confirm Dissolve Team
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to disband team "{{team}}"?

confirm.title: Confirmation of transfer teams
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to transfer team "{{team}}" to "{{user}}"?

no_create.title: You have created a team
no_create.content:
Everyone can only have one team
you can delete the team and recreate it

placeholder.bio: This team is lazy, nothing written

success.title: Team created
success.message: {{team}} has been created, invite your teammates now!
